Subject: Is Your MMO Teaching You About Life?
Description: Massively Multiplayer Online games (MMOs) have been around for decades. Did you know they were teaching you things you could use in real-life?  We will examine the parallels and differences that many don't realize are there until they step back and look at them. Trying to get into a top guild? Better be ready to write a good application and have references and an interview. Sounds a lot like getting a job to me...  Speakers include:Craig Hibbard - Track: Videogaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
